login.title: Sign in to your account
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account

username.minLength: Username must be at least 3 characters

password.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you an OTP code to reset your password
forgotPassword.info: We'll send a verification code to your email address if an account exists.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

verifyOtp.title: Verify OTP
verifyOtp.subtitle: Enter the {length}-digit code sent to {email}
verifyOtp.info: Please check your email for the verification code. Enter it below to continue.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

newPassword.minLength: Password must be at least {length} characters
newPassword.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
newPassword.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
newPassword.number: Password must contain at least one number
newPassword.special: Password must contain at least one special character

success.title: Password reset successful!
success.message: Your password has been reset successfully. You will be redirected to the login page.

403.title: Access Forbidden
403.description: You don't have permission to access this resource. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.
403.tip: If you think you should have access, please check with your administrator or try logging in with a different account.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved, deleted, or the URL might be incorrect.

suggestions.title: What you can do:
suggestions.checkUrl: Check the URL for typos or errors
suggestions.useSearch: Use the search function to find what you need
suggestions.visitHome: Return to the homepage and navigate from there

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: Something went wrong on our end. We're working to fix the issue. Please try again in a few moments.
500.info: This error has been logged and our team has been notified. If the problem persists, please contact support.

support.text: If this problem continues, please contact our support team.
